   23: -module(ssh_options_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: %%% This test suite tests different options for the ssh functions
   26: 
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   30: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %%% Test cases
   33: -export([
   34:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple/1,
   35:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3/1,
   36:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4/1,
   37:          auth_none/1,
   38:          connectfun_disconnectfun_client/1, 
   39: 	 disconnectfun_option_client/1, 
   40: 	 disconnectfun_option_server/1,
   41: 	 bannerfun_server/1,
   42: 	 id_string_no_opt_client/1, 
   43: 	 id_string_no_opt_server/1, 
   44: 	 id_string_own_string_client/1, 
   45: 	 id_string_own_string_client_trail_space/1, 
   46: 	 id_string_own_string_server/1, 
   47: 	 id_string_own_string_server_trail_space/1, 
   48: 	 id_string_random_client/1, 
   49: 	 id_string_random_server/1, 
   50:          max_log_item_len/1,
   51: 	 max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel/1, 
   52: 	 max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential/1, 
   53: 	 max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel/1, 
   54: 	 max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential/1, 
   55:          max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects/1,
   56:          max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects/0,
   57: 	 server_password_option/1, 
   58: 	 server_userpassword_option/1, 
   59: 	 server_pwdfun_option/1,
   60: 	 server_pwdfun_4_option/1,
   61: 	 server_keyboard_interactive/1,
   62: 	 server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg/1,
   63: 	 ssh_connect_arg4_timeout/1, 
   64: 	 ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel/1, 
   65: 	 ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential/1, 
   66: 	 ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel/1,
   67: 	 ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential/1,
   68: 	 ssh_connect_timeout/1, connect/4,
   69: 	 ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option/1, 
   70: 	 ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client/1, 
   71: 	 ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server/1, 
   72: 	 system_dir_option/1, 
   73: 	 unexpectedfun_option_client/1, 
   74: 	 unexpectedfun_option_server/1, 
   75: 	 user_dir_option/1,
   76: 	 user_dir_fun_option/1,
   77: 	 connectfun_disconnectfun_server/1,
   78: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check/1,
   79: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5/1,
   80: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha/1,
   81: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256/1,
   82: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384/1,
   83: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512/1,
   84: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_list/1,
   85:          save_accepted_host_option/1,
   86:          raw_option/1,
   87:          config_file/1,
   88:          config_file_modify_algorithms_order/1,
   89:          daemon_replace_options_simple/1,
   90:          daemon_replace_options_algs/1,
   91:          daemon_replace_options_algs_connect/1,
   92:          daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file/1
   93: 	]).
   94: 
   95: %%% Common test callbacks
   96: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0, 
   97: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   98: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, 
   99: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2
  100: 	]).
  101: 
  102: %%% For test nodes
  103: -export([get_preferred_algorithms/2
  104:         ]).
  105: 
  106: -define(NEWLINE, <<"\r\n">>).
  107: 
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: 
  112: suite() ->
  113:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  114:      {timetrap,{seconds,15}}].
  115: 
  116: all() -> 
  117:     [connectfun_disconnectfun_server,
  118:      bannerfun_server,
  119:      connectfun_disconnectfun_client,
  120:      server_password_option,
  121:      server_userpassword_option,
  122:      server_pwdfun_option,
  123:      server_pwdfun_4_option,
  124:      server_keyboard_interactive,
  125:      server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg,
  126:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple,
  127:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3,
  128:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4,
  129:      auth_none,
  130:      {group, dir_options},
  131:      ssh_connect_timeout,
  132:      ssh_connect_arg4_timeout,
  133:      ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option,
  134:      ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client,
  135:      ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server,
  136:      disconnectfun_option_server,
  137:      disconnectfun_option_client,
  138:      unexpectedfun_option_server,
  139:      unexpectedfun_option_client,
  140:      hostkey_fingerprint_check,
  141:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5,
  142:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha,
  143:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256,
  144:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384,
  145:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512,
  146:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_list,
  147:      id_string_no_opt_client,
  148:      id_string_own_string_client,
  149:      id_string_own_string_client_trail_space,
  150:      id_string_random_client,
  151:      id_string_no_opt_server,
  152:      id_string_own_string_server,
  153:      id_string_own_string_server_trail_space,
  154:      id_string_random_server,
  155:      max_log_item_len,
  156:      save_accepted_host_option,
  157:      raw_option,
  158:      config_file,
  159:      config_file_modify_algorithms_order,
  160:      daemon_replace_options_simple,
  161:      daemon_replace_options_algs,
  162:      daemon_replace_options_algs_connect,
  163:      daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file,
  164:      {group, hardening_tests}
  165:     ].
  166: 
  167: groups() ->
  168:     [{hardening_tests, [], [ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel,
  169: 			    ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential,
  170: 			    ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel,
  171: 			    ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential,
  172: 			    max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel,
  173: 			    max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential,
  174: 			    max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel,
  175: 			    max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential,
  176:                             max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects
  177: 			   ]},
  178:      {dir_options, [], [user_dir_option,
  179:                         user_dir_fun_option,
  180: 			system_dir_option]}
  181:     ].
  182: 
  183: 
  184: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  185: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  186:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(Config).
  187: 
  188: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  189:     ssh:stop().
  190: 
  191: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  192: init_per_group(hardening_tests, Config) ->
  193:     ct:log("Pub keys setup for: ~p",
  194:            [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_host_keys(Config)]),
  195:     Config;
  196: init_per_group(dir_options, Config) ->
  197:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  198:     %% Make unreadable dir:
  199:     Dir_unreadable = filename:join(PrivDir, "unread"),
  200:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir_unreadable),
  201:     {ok,F1} = file:read_file_info(Dir_unreadable),
  202:     ok = file:write_file_info(Dir_unreadable, 
  203: 			      F1#file_info{mode = F1#file_info.mode band (bnot 8#00444)}),
  204:     %% Make readable file:
  205:     File_readable = filename:join(PrivDir, "file"),
  206:     ok = file:write_file(File_readable, <<>>),
  207: 
  208:     %% Check:
  209:     case {file:read_file_info(Dir_unreadable), 
  210: 	  file:read_file_info(File_readable)} of
  211: 	{{ok, Id=#file_info{type=directory, access=Md}},
  212: 	 {ok, If=#file_info{type=regular,   access=Mf}}} ->
  213: 	    AccessOK =
  214: 		case {Md,                Mf} of
  215: 		    {read,               _} -> false;
  216: 		    {read_write,         _} -> false;
  217: 		    {_,               read} -> true;
  218: 		    {_,         read_write} -> true;
  219: 		    _ -> false
  220: 		end,
  221: 
  222: 	    case AccessOK of
  223: 		true ->
  224: 		    %% Save:
  225: 		    [{unreadable_dir, Dir_unreadable},
  226: 		     {readable_file, File_readable} 
  227: 		     | Config];
  228: 		false ->
  229: 		    ct:log("File#file_info : ~p~n"
  230: 			   "Dir#file_info  : ~p",[If,Id]),
  231: 		    {skip, "File or dir mode settings failed"}
  232: 	    end;
  233: 
  234: 	NotDirFile ->
  235: 	    ct:log("{Dir,File} -> ~p",[NotDirFile]),
  236: 	    {skip, "File/Dir creation failed"}
  237:     end;
  238: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  239:     Config.
  240: 
  241: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  242:     Config.
  243: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  244: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  245:     ssh:start(),
  246:     %% Create a clean user_dir
  247:     UserDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), nopubkey),
  248:     ssh_test_lib:del_dirs(UserDir),
  249:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  250:     [{user_dir,UserDir}|Config].
  251: 
  252: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  253:     ssh:stop(),
  254:     ok.
  255: 
  256: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  257: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  258: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  259: 
  260: %%% validate to server that uses the 'password' option
  261: server_password_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  262:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  263:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  264:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  265: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  266: 					     {password, "morot"}]),
  267: 
  268:     ConnectionRef =
  269: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  270: 					  {user, "foo"},
  271: 					  {password, "morot"},
  272: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  273: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  274: 
  275:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  276:     
  277:     {error, Reason} =
  278: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  279:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  280: 				 {user, "vego"},
  281: 				 {password, "foo"},
  282: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  283: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  284:     
  285:     ct:log("Test of wrong password: Error msg: ~p ~n", [Reason]),
  286: 
  287:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  288:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  289: 
  290: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  291: 
  292: %%% validate to server that uses the 'password' option
  293: server_userpassword_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  295:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  296:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  297: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  298: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}]),
  299: 
  300:     ConnectionRef =
  301: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  302: 					  {user, "vego"},
  303: 					  {password, "morot"},
  304: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  305: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  306:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  307: 
  308:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  309: 
  310:     {error, Reason} =
  311: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  312:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  313: 				 {user, "foo"},
  314: 				 {password, "morot"},
  315: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  316: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  317:     {error, Reason} =
  318: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  319:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  320: 				 {user, "vego"},
  321: 				 {password, "foo"},
  322: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  323: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  324:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  325: 
  326: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  327: %%% validate to server that uses the 'pwdfun' option
  328: server_pwdfun_option(Config) ->
  329:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  330:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  331:     CHKPWD = fun("foo",Pwd) -> Pwd=="bar";
  332: 		(_,_) -> false
  333: 	     end,
  334:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  335: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  336: 					     {pwdfun,CHKPWD}]),
  337:     ConnectionRef =
  338: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  339: 					  {user, "foo"},
  340: 					  {password, "bar"},
  341: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  342: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  343:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  344: 
  345:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  346:     
  347:     {error, Reason} =
  348: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  349:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  350: 				 {user, "foo"},
  351: 				 {password, "morot"},
  352: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  353: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  354:     {error, Reason} =
  355: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  356:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  357: 				 {user, "vego"},
  358: 				 {password, "foo"},
  359: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  360: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  361:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  362: 
  363:     
  364: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  365: %%% validate to server that uses the 'pwdfun/4' option
  366: server_pwdfun_4_option(Config) ->
  367:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  368:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  369:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",Pwd,{_,_},undefined) -> Pwd=="bar";
  370: 		("fie",Pwd,{_,_},undefined) -> {Pwd=="bar",new_state};
  371: 		("bandit",_,_,_) -> disconnect;
  372: 		(_,_,_,_) -> false
  373: 	     end,
  374:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  375: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  376: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN}]),
  377:     ConnectionRef1 =
  378: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  379: 					  {user, "foo"},
  380: 					  {password, "bar"},
  381: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  382: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  383:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef1),
  384: 
  385:     ConnectionRef2 =
  386: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  387: 					  {user, "fie"},
  388: 					  {password, "bar"},
  389: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  390: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  391:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  392: 
  393:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  394:     
  395:     {error, Reason} =
  396: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  397:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  398: 				 {user, "foo"},
  399: 				 {password, "morot"},
  400: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  401: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  402:     {error, Reason} =
  403: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  404:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  405: 				 {user, "fie"},
  406: 				 {password, "morot"},
  407: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  408: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  409:     {error, Reason} =
  410: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  411: 				 {user, "vego"},
  412: 				 {password, "foo"},
  413: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  414: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  415: 
  416:     {error, Reason} =
  417: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  418:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  419: 				 {user, "bandit"},
  420: 				 {password, "pwd breaking"},
  421: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  422: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  423:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  424: 
  425:     
  426: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  427: server_keyboard_interactive(Config) ->
  428:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  429:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  430:     %% Test that the state works
  431:     Parent = self(),
  432:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",P="bar",_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},true; 
  433: 		(_,P,_,S=undefined) -> Parent!{P,S},{false,1}; 
  434: 		(_,P,_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},          {false,S+1}
  435: 	     end,
  436:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  437: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  438: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  439: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN}]),
  440: 
  441:     %% Try with passwords "incorrect", "Bad again" and finally "bar"
  442:     KIFFUN = fun(_Name, _Instr, _PromptInfos) ->
  443: 		     K={k,self()},
  444:                      Answer =
  445:                          case get(K) of
  446:                              undefined ->
  447:                                  put(K,1),
  448:                                  ["incorrect"];
  449:                              2 ->
  450:                                  put(K,3),
  451:                                  ["bar"];
  452:                              S->
  453:                                  put(K,S+1),
  454:                                  ["Bad again"]
  455:                          end,
  456:                      ct:log("keyboard_interact_fun:~n"
  457:                             " Name        = ~p~n"
  458:                             " Instruction = ~p~n"
  459:                             " Prompts     = ~p~n"
  460:                             "~nAnswer:~n  ~p~n",
  461:                             [_Name, _Instr, _PromptInfos, Answer]),
  462: 
  463:                      Answer
  464: 	     end,
  465:     
  466:     ConnectionRef2 = 
  467: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  468: 					  {user, "foo"},
  469: 					  {keyboard_interact_fun, KIFFUN},
  470: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  471:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  472:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  473: 
  474:     lists:foreach(fun(Expect) ->
  475: 			  receive
  476: 			      Expect -> ok;
  477: 			      Other -> ct:fail("Expect: ~p~nReceived ~p",[Expect,Other])
  478: 			  after
  479: 			      2000 -> ct:fail("Timeout expecting ~p",[Expect])
  480: 			  end
  481: 		  end, [{"incorrect",undefined},
  482: 			{"Bad again",1},
  483: 			{"bar",2}]).
  484: 
  485: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  486: server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg(Config) ->
  487:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  488:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  489:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  490: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  491: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  492:                                              {tstflg, [{one_empty,true}]},
  493:                                              {user_passwords, [{"foo","bar"}]}
  494:                                             ]),
  495: 
  496:     ConnectionRef =
  497: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  498: 					  {user, "foo"},
  499: 					  {password, "bar"},
  500: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  501:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  502:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  503: 
  504: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  505: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple(Config) ->
  506:     T = {"abc1", "def1", "ghi1: ", true},
  507:     amkid(Config, T, T).
  508: 
  509: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3(Config) ->
  510:     T = {"abc2", "def2", "ghi2: ", true},
  511:     amkid(Config, T,
  512:           fun(_Peer, _User, _Service) -> T end
  513:          ).
  514: 
  515: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4(Config) ->
  516:     T = {"abc3", "def3", "ghi3: ", true},
  517:     amkid(Config, T,
  518:           fun(_Peer, _User, _Service, _State) -> T end
  519:          ).
  520: 
  521: amkid(Config, {ExpectName,ExpectInstr,ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}, OptVal) ->
  522:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  523:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  524:     %% Test that the state works
  525:     Parent = self(),
  526:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",P="bar",_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},true;
  527: 		(_,P,_,S=undefined) -> Parent!{P,S},{false,1};
  528: 		(_,P,_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},          {false,S+1}
  529: 	     end,
  530:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  531: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  532: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  533: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN},
  534:                                              {auth_method_kb_interactive_data,OptVal}
  535:                                             ]),
  536: 
  537:     KIFFUN = fun(Name, Instr, PromptInfos) ->
  538: 		     K={k,self()},
  539:                      Answer =
  540:                          case get(K) of
  541:                              undefined ->
  542:                                  put(K,1),
  543:                                  ["incorrect"];
  544:                              2 ->
  545:                                  put(K,3),
  546:                                  ["bar"];
  547:                              S->
  548:                                  put(K,S+1),
  549:                                  ["Bad again"]
  550:                          end,
  551:                      ct:log("keyboard_interact_fun:~n"
  552:                             " Name        = ~p~n"
  553:                             " Instruction = ~p~n"
  554:                             " Prompts     = ~p~n"
  555:                             "~nAnswer:~n  ~p~n",
  556:                             [Name, Instr, PromptInfos, Answer]),
  557:                      case {binary_to_list(Name),
  558:                            binary_to_list(Instr),
  559:                            [{binary_to_list(PI),Echo} || {PI,Echo} <- PromptInfos]
  560:                           } of
  561:                          {ExpectName, ExpectInstr, [{ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}]} ->
  562:                              ct:log("Match!", []),
  563:                              Answer;
  564:                          _ ->
  565:                              ct:log("Not match!~n"
  566:                                     " ExpectName        = ~p~n"
  567:                                     " ExpectInstruction = ~p~n"
  568:                                     " ExpectPrompts     = ~p~n",
  569:                                     [ExpectName, ExpectInstr, [{ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}]]),
  570:                              ct:fail("no_match")
  571:                      end
  572: 	     end,
  573:     ssh_dbg:start(), ssh_dbg:on(authentication), %% Test dbg code
  574:     ConnectionRef2 =
  575: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  576: 					  {user, "foo"},
  577: 					  {keyboard_interact_fun, KIFFUN},
  578: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  579:     ssh_dbg:stop(),
  580:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  581:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  582: 
  583:     lists:foreach(fun(Expect) ->
  584: 			  receive
  585: 			      Expect -> ok;
  586: 			      Other -> ct:fail("Expect: ~p~nReceived ~p",[Expect,Other])
  587: 			  after
  588: 			      2000 -> ct:fail("Timeout expecting ~p",[Expect])
  589: 			  end
  590: 		  end, [{"incorrect",undefined},
  591: 			{"Bad again",1},
  592: 			{"bar",2}]).
  593: 
  594: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  595: auth_none(Config) ->
  596:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  597:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  598:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  599:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  600:     {DaemonRef, Host, Port} =
  601: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  602: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
  603: 			     {auth_methods, "password"}, % to make even more sure we don't use public-key-auth
  604: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo","somepwd"}]}, % Not to be used
  605:                              {no_auth_needed, true} % we test this
  606: 			    ]),
  607:     ClientConnRef1 =
  608: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  609: 					  {user, "some-other-user"},
  610: 					  {password, "wrong-pwd"},
  611: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  612: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  613:     "some-other-user" =
  614:         proplists:get_value(user, ssh:connection_info(ClientConnRef1, [user])),
  615:     ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
  616:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef).
  617: 
  618: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  619: system_dir_option(Config) ->
  620:     DirUnread = proplists:get_value(unreadable_dir,Config),
  621:     FileRead = proplists:get_value(readable_file,Config),
  622: 
  623:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, DirUnread}]) of
  624: 	{error,{eoptions,{{system_dir,DirUnread},eacces}}} ->
  625: 	    ok;
  626: 	{Pid1,_Host1,Port1} when is_pid(Pid1),is_integer(Port1) ->
  627: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid1),
  628: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that dir is unreadable", [])
  629: 	end,
  630:     
  631:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, FileRead}]) of
  632: 	{error,{eoptions,{{system_dir,FileRead},enotdir}}} ->
  633: 	    ok;
  634: 	{Pid2,_Host2,Port2} when is_pid(Pid2),is_integer(Port2) ->
  635: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid2),
  636: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that option is a plain file", [])
  637:     end.
  638: 
  639: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  640: user_dir_option(Config) ->
  641:     DirUnread = proplists:get_value(unreadable_dir,Config),
  642:     FileRead = proplists:get_value(readable_file,Config),
  643:     %% Any port will do (beware, implementation knowledge!):
  644:     Port = 65535,
  645: 
  646:     case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{user_dir, DirUnread},
  647:                                          {save_accepted_host, false}]) of
  648: 	{error,{eoptions,{{user_dir,DirUnread},eacces}}} ->
  649: 	    ok;
  650: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  651: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that dir is unreadable", [])
  652:     end,
  653: 
  654:     case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{user_dir, FileRead},
  655:                                          {save_accepted_host, false}]) of
  656: 	{error,{eoptions,{{user_dir,FileRead},enotdir}}} ->
  657: 	    ok;
  658: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  659: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that option is a plain file", [])
  660:     end.
  661: 
  662: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  663: user_dir_fun_option(Config) ->
  664:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  665:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  666:     SysDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"system"),
  667:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_host_keys(DataDir, SysDir),
  668:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"user"),
  669:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_keys(DataDir, UserDir),
  670: 
  671:     Parent = self(),
  672:     Ref = make_ref(),
  673:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  674: 					     {user_dir_fun, fun(User) ->
  675:                                                                     ct:log("user_dir_fun called ~p",[User]),
  676:                                                                     Parent ! {user,Ref,User},
  677:                                                                     UserDir
  678:                                                             end},
  679: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  680:     _ConnectionRef =
  681: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  682: 					  {user, "foo"},
  683: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  684:                                           {auth_methods,"publickey"},
  685: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  686:     receive
  687:         {user,Ref,"foo"} ->
  688:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  689:             ok;
  690:         {user,Ref,What} ->
  691:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  692:             ct:log("Got ~p",[What]),
  693:             {fail, bad_userid}
  694:     after 2000 ->
  695:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  696:             {fail,timeout_in_receive}
  697:     end.
  698: 
  699: 
  700: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  701: %%% validate client that uses the 'ssh_msg_debug_fun' option
  702: ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client(Config) ->
  703:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  704:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  705: 
  706:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  707: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  708: 					     {password, "morot"},
  709: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  710:     Parent = self(),
  711:     DbgFun = fun(ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang) -> Parent ! {msg_dbg,{ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang}} end,
  712: 		
  713:     ConnectionRef =
  714: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  715: 					  {user, "foo"},
  716: 					  {password, "morot"},
  717: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  718: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  719: 					  {ssh_msg_debug_fun,DbgFun}]),
  720:     %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  721:     gen_statem:cast(ConnectionRef,{ssh_msg_debug,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}),
  722:     receive
  723: 	{msg_dbg,X={ConnectionRef,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  724: 	    ct:log("Got expected dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  725: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  726: 	{msg_dbg,X={_,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  727: 	    ct:log("Got dbg msg but bad ConnectionRef (~p expected) ~p",[ConnectionRef,X]),
  728: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  729: 	    {fail, "Bad ConnectionRef received"};
  730: 	{msg_dbg,X} ->
  731: 	    ct:log("Got bad dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  732: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  733: 	    {fail,"Bad msg received"}
  734:     after 1000 ->
  735: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  736: 	    {fail,timeout}
  737:     end.
  738: 
  739: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  740: connectfun_disconnectfun_server(Config) ->
  741:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  742:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  743: 
  744:     Parent = self(),
  745:     Ref = make_ref(),
  746:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connect,Ref} end,
  747:     DiscFun = fun(R) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Ref,R} end,
  748: 
  749:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  750: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  751: 					     {password, "morot"},
  752: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  753: 					     {disconnectfun, DiscFun},
  754: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun}]),
  755:     ConnectionRef =
  756: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  757: 					  {user, "foo"},
  758: 					  {password, "morot"},
  759: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  760: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  761:     receive
  762: 	{connect,Ref} ->
  763: 	    ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  764: 	    receive
  765: 		{disconnect,Ref,R} ->
  766: 		    ct:log("Disconnect result: ~p",[R]),
  767: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  768: 	    after 10000 ->
  769: 		    receive
  770: 			X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  771: 		    after 0 -> ok
  772: 		    end,
  773: 		    {fail, "No disconnectfun action"}
  774: 	    end
  775:     after 10000 ->
  776: 	    receive
  777: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  778: 	    after 0 -> ok
  779: 	    end,
  780: 	    {fail, "No connectfun action"}
  781:     end.
  782: 
  783: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  784: bannerfun_server(Config) ->
  785:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  786:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  787: 
  788:     Parent = self(),
  789:     Ref = make_ref(),
  790:     BannerFun = fun(U) -> Parent ! {banner,Ref,U}, list_to_binary(U) end,
  791: 
  792:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  793: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  794: 					     {password, "morot"},
  795: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  796: 					     {bannerfun, BannerFun}]),
  797:     ConnectionRef =
  798: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  799: 					  {user, "foo"},
  800: 					  {password, "morot"},
  801: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  802: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  803:     receive
  804: 	{banner,Ref,U} ->
  805: 	   "foo" = U,
  806:             %% Make sure no second banner is sent
  807:             receive
  808: 		{banner,Ref,U} ->
  809:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  810:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  811:                     {fail, "More than 1 banner sent"}
  812: 	    after 2000 ->
  813:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  814:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  815: 	    end
  816:     after 10000 ->
  817: 	    receive
  818: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  819: 	    after 0 -> ok
  820: 	    end,
  821: 	    {fail, "No bannerfun action"}
  822:     end.
  823:

  853: %%% validate client that uses the 'ssh_msg_debug_fun' option
  854: ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server(Config) ->
  855:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  856:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  857: 
  858:     Parent = self(),
  859:     DbgFun = fun(ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang) -> Parent ! {msg_dbg,{ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang}} end,
  860:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connection_pid,self()} end,
  861: 
  862:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  863: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  864: 					     {password, "morot"},
  865: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  866: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun},
  867: 					     {ssh_msg_debug_fun, DbgFun}]),
  868:     _ConnectionRef =
  869: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  870: 					  {user, "foo"},
  871: 					  {password, "morot"},
  872: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  873: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  874:     receive
  875: 	{connection_pid,Server} ->
  876: 	    %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  877: 	    gen_statem:cast(Server,{ssh_msg_debug,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}),
  878: 	    receive
  879: 		{msg_dbg,X={_,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  880: 		    ct:log("Got expected dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  881: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  882: 		{msg_dbg,X} ->
  883: 		    ct:log("Got bad dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  884: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  885: 		    {fail,"Bad msg received"}
  886: 	    after 3000 ->
  887: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  888: 		    {fail,timeout2}
  889: 	    end
  890:     after 3000 ->
  891: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  892: 	    {fail,timeout1}
  893:     end.

  896: disconnectfun_option_server(Config) ->
  897:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  898:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  899: 
  900:     Parent = self(),

  902: 
  903:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  904: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  905: 					     {password, "morot"},
  906: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  907: 					     {disconnectfun, DisConnFun}]),
  908:     ConnectionRef =
  909: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  910: 					  {user, "foo"},
  911: 					  {password, "morot"},
  912: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  913: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  914:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  915:     receive
  916: 	{disconnect,Reason} ->
  917: 	    ct:log("Server detected disconnect: ~p",[Reason]),
  918: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  919: 	    ok
  920:     after 5000 ->
  921: 	    receive
  922: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  923: 	    after 0 -> ok
  924: 	    end,
  925: 	    {fail,"Timeout waiting for disconnect"}
  926:     end.

  960: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  961: unexpectedfun_option_server(Config) ->
  962:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  963:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  964: 
  965:     Parent = self(),
  966:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connection_pid,self()} end,
  967:     UnexpFun = fun(Msg,Peer) ->
  968: 		       Parent ! {unexpected,Msg,Peer,self()},
  969: 		       skip
  970: 	       end,
  971: 
  972:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  973: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  974: 					     {password, "morot"},
  975: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  976: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun},
  977: 					     {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun}]),
  978:     _ConnectionRef =
  979: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  980: 					  {user, "foo"},
  981: 					  {password, "morot"},
  982: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  983: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  984:     receive
  985: 	{connection_pid,Server} ->
  986: 	    %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  987: 	    Server ! unexpected_message,
  988: 	    receive
  989: 		{unexpected, unexpected_message, {{_,_,_,_},_}, _} -> ok;
  990: 		{unexpected, unexpected_message, Peer, _} -> ct:fail("Bad peer ~p",[Peer]);
  991: 		M = {unexpected, _, _, _} -> ct:fail("Bad msg ~p",[M])
  992: 	    after 3000 ->
  993: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  994: 		    {fail,timeout2}
  995: 	    end
  996:     after 3000 ->
  997: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  998: 	    {fail,timeout1}
  999:     end.
 1000: 
 1001: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1002: unexpectedfun_option_client(Config) ->
 1003:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1004:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1005: 
 1006:     Parent = self(),
 1007:     UnexpFun = fun(Msg,Peer) -> 
 1008: 		       Parent ! {unexpected,Msg,Peer,self()},
 1009: 		       skip
 1010: 	       end,
 1011: 
 1012:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1013: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1014: 					     {password, "morot"},
 1015: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1016:     ConnectionRef =
 1017: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1018: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1019: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1020: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1021: 					  {user_interaction, false},
 1022: 					  {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun}]),
 1023:     %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
 1024:     ConnectionRef ! unexpected_message,
 1025: 
 1026:     receive
 1027: 	{unexpected, unexpected_message, {{_,_,_,_},_}, ConnectionRef} ->
 1028: 	    ok;
 1029: 	{unexpected, unexpected_message, Peer, ConnectionRef} ->
 1030: 	    ct:fail("Bad peer ~p",[Peer]);
 1031: 	M = {unexpected, _, _, _} ->
 1032: 	    ct:fail("Bad msg ~p",[M])
 1033:     after 3000 ->
 1034: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1035: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1036:     end.
